Description: *NEXT SHOWING WEDNESDAY, AUGUST 9TH 2023 FROM 5:30PM TO 6:30PM* Beautiful renovated Beacon Hill 2 bedroom, 1 bath apartment on a sunny second floor available 9/1/22 to rent! The apartment features a newer kitchen, and bathroom, living room with exposed bricks with hardwood floors running throughout. Come view this unit in an elegant professionally managed building. Steps away from Whole Foods, Mass General Hospital, Charles St T stop, and Suffolk University. Heat and Hot water included!
